task.title: Sending an announcement
task.shortdesc: Send a message to all the online members of a group simultaneously.

context.p: Recipients get the announcement as a pop-up alert on their clients unless you allow the recipients to respond to the message. In this case, a chat screen opens in each recipient's Sametime window

step.cmd: From the contact list, tap the menu icon and select Announcement.
If you want to allow recipients to respond to the message, tap the Allow recipients to send response checkbox.
step.info: Recipients can send a message to you by tapping Reply.
